title: A few nice eye appeal cards FS inc. portraits ***ALL SOLD***

posts.post_title: A few nice eye appeal cards FS inc. portraits ***ALL SOLD***
posts.post_content:
A few FS. Price is net to me and delivered with tracking. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or on-going negotiations.

All super nice eye appeal for the grade IMO.

Bowerman $150 ***SOLD***
Jordan $150 ***SOLD***
Bridwell $125 ***SOLD***
Stahl $95 ***SOLD***
Murphy $95 ***SOLD***
Dahlen $350 ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
